definition: to vow loyalty and devotion to

sentences.english: That is what he remains - committed to this club.
sentences.chinese: 这就是他一直效忠俱乐部的原因。

sentences.english: They covenanted in loyalty to the king.
Allegiance to chiefs was a fundamental of Polynesian culture.
sentences.chinese: 效忠首领是波利尼西亚人最基本的文化。

sentences.english: Polish Pope John Paul II then pledged his obedience to the Freemasons.
sentences.chinese: 波兰籍的约翰保罗二世随后宣誓对共济会效忠。

sentences.english: "And didn't you swear allegiance to this country when you became a citizen?" she asked.
sentences.chinese: “当时你没宣誓对这个国家效忠么？”她问。

sentences.english: He was so impressed by your wondrous palaces that he and his retinue swore their allegiances to you.
sentences.chinese: 他被你辉煌的宫殿深深震撼，率领他的随从向你效忠。

sentences.english: It must make clear that reprisals against surrendering Qaddafi loyalists will not be tolerated.
sentences.chinese: 必须明确的是，不可对投降的卡扎菲效忠者实施报复。

sentences.english: What do we show loyalty to when we say the Pledge of Allegiance ?
sentences.chinese: 当我们宣誓效忠时，是向什么表达忠诚？

sentences.english: Then they will always be loyal to him.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们就总会死心塌地的效忠于他了。

sentences.english: The third type of survey is the annual in-depth Allegiance Survey.
sentences.chinese: 调查第三类是每年深入的效忠调查。

sentences.english: Kael'thas pledged his allegiance to Illidan, who taught several blood elves the techniques he had offered.
sentences.chinese: 凯尔萨斯宣誓效忠教授血精灵吸取魔力方法的伊利丹。

sentences.english: These young men have a promising future ahead of them if they will be loyal to the king of Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 其实这些年青人若然效忠巴比伦王，必定前程似锦。

sentences.english: They covenanted in loyalty to the king.
sentences.chinese: 他们缔结盟约以效忠国王。

sentences.english: There are some weird assumptions made about sporting allegiances .
sentences.chinese: 有关体育方面效忠，有不少很奇怪的假设。

sentences.english: Aquilani has always pledged allegiance to Roma in the past.
sentences.chinese: 阿奎拉尼一直宣誓效忠罗马。

sentences.english: Homage wasaccordinglythe acknowledgment ofthebond tenure between lord and tenant.
sentences.chinese: 效忠同样也是对领主和佃户之间租赁契约的确认。

definition: to surrender and pay allegiance to
to acknowledge allegiance to (some regime)/to serve
to display utter loyalty/to be loyal to the end
to rely on help from sb
to realign one's allegiance (to another religion, ruler etc)/to submit
loyal and devoted (idiom); faithful and true
to obey an order/to take orders/to accept a state of affairs
to confer a title upon sb/to dub/to crown/to invest with rank or title
